channel.title: Thieving
channel.description:
So, can someone help me fix my thieving?
On my server the small stalls don't work: http://gyazo.com/d47f4778240ffb700a53f2d48dd7c401
But the big ones do: http://gyazo.com/a8c5d50aa30d1fb1618bfc8768c0d124
But, there's a catch. The big ones clear and disappear after one use. Can anyone help me fix the big ones or make the small ones work? Or this may be asking a lot but if possible help me over teamviewer?
If you need any code posted, ask i'll go get.
I am completely lost so I don't even know where to go.
Sorry and thanks, Bank

item.title: Thieving
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Try add the objects ids from the small ones by athe big ones in thieving.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving
item.dc:creator: @Bank_Coding Bank Coding
item.description:
@Bank_Coding wrote:

[quote=“DeltaMax, post:2, topic:475794”]you’ll have to open your ClickObject (PI), or search for case 132 in the client.java (delta)

to add the small stalls, you’ll have to add the ids + the xp rates + the items you get from them
to fix the big stalls, search for the thieving code and delete the deleteobject/replaceobject stuff and its timer

(if you server’s 317, your links didn’t work for me)[/quote]

Oops, so sorry. Forgot to include its a 718… I’m stupid

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving
item.dc:creator: @DeltaMax DeltaMax
item.description:
@DeltaMax wrote:

you’ll have to open your ClickObject (PI), or search for case 132 in the client.java (delta)

to add the small stalls, you’ll have to add the ids + the xp rates + the items you get from them
to fix the big stalls, search for the thieving code and delete the deleteobject/replaceobject stuff and its timer

(if you server’s 317, your links didn’t work for me)

Read full topic
